title: Hollywood Blackmail
description: Lizzie Kent needs to forget the past. She lives in total anonymity, immersing herself in nursing to help her forget. But when a man from her previous life turns up in her clinic, the life sheâ€™s tried to create for herself may come toppling down.Ash knows what he wants and he wants Lizzie, the girl who left him all those years ago. As Hollywood's greatest action superstar no one says no to him, but when Lizzie refuses to acknowledge their shared past, he has to resort to a little old fashioned blackmail.Will Lizzie revisit her past to enable her future with the man she loves, or do old wounds run too deep?
author: Jackie Ashenden
